attributes.long-description:
Simple. Fun. Classic. The retro baseball gameplay you’ve been craving is back and updated with modern graphics, 2014 players and all 30 MLB teams. Play season, postseason and exhibition mode. Experience PURE FUN that everyone can enjoy solo or with a friend!

Video output in Full HD 1080p requires 1080p native display.

2-1 players
1MB minimum save size
1080p HD Video Output

attributes.name: R.B.I. Baseball 14
